text: Niedererlinsbach is a former municipality in the district Gösgen in the canton of Solothurn in Switzerland. On 1 January 2006 the former municipalities of Niedererlinsbach and Obererlinsbach became the municipality of Erlinsbach.Nomenklaturen – Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 4 April 2011 == References == Category:Former municipalities of Solothurn Category:Villages in Switzerland
title: Niedererlinsbach
